nodes.text: Sergeant was a rank held by certain officers in the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the Galactic Republic, and its successor, the Galactic Empire. It was higher than the rank of corporal, and private.[source?] Several clone troopers in the Grand Army of the Republic held the rank of Clone Sergeant.
Crest, a former clone trooper, was a sergeant in the Imperial Army's Stormtrooper Corps. In the Stormtrooper Corps, sergeants wore a white pauldron to indicate their rank.
